name: Spellwake
description: Spellwake is an online 3D Action RPG where Anything Goes. It features fast-paced hack n' slash against hordes of monsters and powerful bosses. Spellwake's vast class system allows you to make nearly infinite variations of builds.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 10, Vista Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
